short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives a Spotify link to the song playing in the current (Youtube) tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Many people use both YouTube and Spotify. Sometimes you are listening to music on YouTube but would like to find it on Spotify. This extension allows you to do this in one click!
